headline: Jim Cramer on Otis Worldwide: “It’s Less Hostage to the Broader Global Economy Than You’d Expect”
summary: Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE:OTIS) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer discussed the company’s earnings during the episode, as he commented: “Is Otis Worldwide, the top dog in the elevator business, on the rise again? When this company last reported in July, the numbers were mixed, and the stock went down 12%. […]

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock with Impressive Fundamentals and 2 That Underwhelm
summary: Large-cap stocks usually command their industries because they have the scale to drive market trends. The flip side though is that their sheer size can limit growth as expanding further becomes an increasingly challenging task.

raw.headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock with Impressive Fundamentals and 2 That Underwhelm
raw.summary: Large-cap stocks usually command their industries because they have the scale to drive market trends. The flip side though is that their sheer size can limit growth as expanding further becomes an increasingly challenging task.

headline: Otis (OTIS) Net Margin Decline Challenges Bullish Narratives on Profit Quality and Value Discount
summary: Otis Worldwide (OTIS) is forecasting earnings growth of 12.9% per year, with revenue expected to rise at 4.8% annually. Both of these figures are below broader US market forecasts of 15.7% earnings growth and 10.3% revenue growth. The company’s net profit margin has narrowed to 9.4% from 11.5% the previous year, while earnings over the past year have declined, despite an average annual growth rate of 9% across the last five years. Investors are left to weigh a mix of moderate earnings...
